name: CFOP Method (Fridrich)
description: Advanced speedsolving method using Cross, F2L (First Two Layers), OLL (Orient Last Layer), and PLL (Permute Last Layer). The most popular method for speedcubing.

stages.name: Cross
stages.description: Solve the first layer cross (usually white or yellow)

stages.name: F2L (First Two Layers)
stages.description: Solve the first two layers simultaneously using corner-edge pairs

stages.name: OLL (Orient Last Layer)
stages.description: Orient all pieces on the last layer to show the correct color on top

stages.name: PLL (Permute Last Layer)
stages.description: Permute the last layer pieces to solve the cube
